Perjuangan Lanny 'Menahan Rindu' pada Redmi Note 8 Pro
06 Nov 2019, 11:54 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikinet

Jakarta - Spek mumpuni dan dibanderol murah, jurus itu mampu menghipnosis banyak orang untuk melirik Redmi Note 8 Pro, termasuk Lanny Kusumastuti. Sayangnya butuh perjuangan dan kesabaran agar dia bisa menggenggam ponsel terbaru besutan Xiaomi itu.Saat Xiaomi mengumumkan Redmi Note 8 Pro mulai dijual 29 Oktober, Lanny langsung mencatatnya di kalender. Dia ingin segera membelinya untuk menggantikan ponsel yang digunakan saat ini."Pakai Sony Xperia C5, karena rusak jadi memang cari ponsel baru. Karena speknya bagus, ada NFC dan harganya murah jadi pilih Redmi Note 8 Pro," ujarnya kepada detikINET.Tibalah 29 Oktober, Lanny pun sudah bersiap untuk memesan Redmi Note 8 Pro secara flash sale. Sayangnya dia kurang beruntung, baru hendak melakukan pembayaran, unit yang ditawarkan sudah habis terjual.


Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikinet

Perempuan yang kerja sebagai editor di media online wanita ini tidak lantas patah semangat. Demi ponsel barunya itu dia lantas bergegas ke toko Mi Store Pondok Indah Mall (PIM).Sampai di sana, suasana toko cukup ramai. Lanny mendapatkan antrean ke-33. Dia memesan Redmi Note 8 Pro RAM 6 GB/ROM 128 GB. "Inginnya sih varian warna Mineral Grey. Tapi kata staf Mi Store tidak bisa memilih warna saat pre-order. Tapi saya nggak masalah yang penting speknya," kata Lanny.

Lanny's Struggle 'Withholding Longing' on Redmi Note 8 Pro
Nov 6 2019, 11:54 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikinet

Jakarta - Spec and qualified and priced cheap, the move was able to hypnotize many people to glance at Redmi Note 8 Pro, including Lanny Kusumastuti. Unfortunately it takes a struggle and patience so he can hold the latest cellphone made by Xiaomi. When Xiaomi announced the Redmi Note 8 Pro went on sale October 29, Lanny immediately noted it on the calendar. He wants to immediately buy it to replace the cellphone that is used today. "Use the Sony Xperia C5, because it is broken so it's looking for a new cellphone. Because the specs are good, there is NFC and the price is cheap so choose Redmi Note 8 Pro," he told detikINET. , Lanny was already preparing to order the Redmi Note 8 Pro in a flash sale. Unfortunately he was out of luck, just about to make a payment, the units offered were sold out.


Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikinet

The woman who works as an editor in women's online media does not necessarily lose heart. For the sake of his new cellphone, he then rushed to the Mi Store Pondok Indah Mall (PIM) store. Once there, the atmosphere of the shop was quite crowded. Lanny got the 33rd queue. He ordered a Redmi Note 8 Pro RAM 6GB / 128GB ROM. "I want Mineral Gray color variant. But the Mi Store staff can not choose the color when pre-ordered. But I do not have an important issue," said Lanny.
